install.name: K2 Plugin - Google Maps
install.author: Simon Wells
install.copyright: Copyright (c) 2010 Simon Wells. All rights reserved.
install.description: A K2 plugin to display Google Maps in K2 Items.

param.name: longitude
param.label: Longitude
param.description: The Geographical Longitude of the location, example: 50.807177

param.name: latitude
param.label: Latitude
param.description: The Geographical Latitude of the location, example: -0.36887

param.name: color
param.label: Marker Color
param.description: Color of the marker, which will indicate the location.

param.name: marker
param.label: Title of the position
param.description: Use some title to indicate the desired location

param.name: zoom
param.label: Zoom
param.description: Zoom level of the map. Note: Higher = More Zoom, Lower = More map detail. On certain places high levels of zoom might not be available, this is a limitaion of Google maps.

param.name: width
param.label: Width of the map
param.description: Enter a numeric value only (in px, but do not enter px text), for the width of the map

param.name: height
param.label: Height of the map
param.description: Enter a numeric value only (in px, but do not enter px text), for the height of the map
